catalog_script_client.name: Update Category

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_397859658778419005fd63583cbb35fa
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Report Fraud">1d7859658778419005fd63583cbb3547</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e57859658778419005fd63583cbb35d9</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Update Category</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	g_form.clearOptions('category');
	g_form.addOption("category", "", "-- None --");
	
	if(g_form.getValue("complaint_type") === "1") {
		g_form.addOption("category", 1, "Defective Product");
		g_form.addOption("category", 2, "Quality Issues");
		g_form.addOption("category", 3, "Service Issues");
		g_form.addOption("category", 4, "Pricing Issues");
	}
	else  {
		g_form.addOption("category", 5, "Facility Issue");
		g_form.addOption("category", 6, "Staff Issue");
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-02 00:47:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>397859658778419005fd63583cbb35fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Category</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Unemployment application" source="x_snc_unemployment">b348079cdb481850afe2ac4e13961971</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unemployment application">b348079cdb481850afe2ac4e13961971</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_397859658778419005fd63583cbb35fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-02 00:47:33</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
